T01n852u_001:9: klīṃ ḍāṃ klīṃ ḍāṃ ninādairvaradahanabhuvi kṣetrapaḥ pātu yuṣmān || 2 ||
T01n852u_001:10: kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣāntimūrtiḥ kalakalakalakṛt kṣāntivṛddhiṃ prakurvan |
T01n852u_001:12: hrīṃ śrīṃ klīṃ mantradehaḥ paca paca dahanairjātamantraḥ samantād
T01n852u_001:18: khaṃ khaṃ khaṃ khaṅgapāṇirlalalalalalito rūpato raktapāṇiḥ
T01n852u_001:19: raṃ raṃ raṃ raktanetro ru ru rudhirakaraścarcitaścaṇḍavegaḥ |
T01n852u_001:20: kruṃ kruṃ kruṃ krodhadṛṣṭiḥ kuha kuha kuṭilaḥ kuñcitāśeṣaduṣṭaḥ
T01n852u_001:21: ḍaṃ ḍaṃ ḍaṃ ḍāmarāṅgo ḍamarukasahito rakṣatāt kṣetrapālaḥ || 5 ||
T01n852u_001:22: yaṃ yaṃ yaṃ yāti viśvaṃ yamaniyamayuto yāmino'yāmino vā
T01n852u_001:23: vaṃ vaṃ vaṃ vātavego jhaṭiti karakadhṛt prāptalokopacāraḥ |
T01n852u_001:24: bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhīṣaṇāṅgo bhṛkuṭikṛtabhayo muktivān sādhakānāṃ
T01n852u_001:25: kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣemakārī kṣapayatu duritaṃ rakṣatāt kṣetrapālaḥ || 6 ||
T01n852u_001:26: klāṃ klāṃ klāṃ krāntimūrtistribhuvanamaniśaṃ kledayan sarvadā yaḥ
T01n852u_001:27: paṃ paṃ paṃ pāśahastaḥ paraśudhṛtakaraḥ pālayan pālanīyān |
T01n852u_001:30: klīṃ klīṃ klīṃ kṛttivāsā kṛtaripuniyamaḥ kleśitānāṃ sadeśaḥ
T01n852u_001:31: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃ kapālamālī kalikaluṣaharaḥ kālavṛndābhakāyaḥ |
T01n852u_001:32: caṃ caṃ caṃ caṇḍavegaḥ pracaritasamayāḥ kālabhūtaikalokaḥ
T01n852u_001:33: saṃ saṃ saṃ saṃyatātmā samayaśubhaphalaṃ lakṣyatāṃ pātu yuṣmān || 8 ||
T01n852u_001:35: ācāryaḥ sādhako vā japati ca niyataṃ puṇyavān jāyate'sau |
T01n852u_001:36: āyuḥ śrīḥ kīrtilakṣmīrdhṛtibalamatulaṃ śāntipuṣṭī prabhā ca
T01n852u_001:37: sarvajñatvaṃ ca nityaṃ dinaniśamatulaṃ naśyate vighnajātam || 9 ||
